pullRequest.body:
This PR refactors the four and the five lemmas so as to use the new homology API. The files `Algebra.Homology.ShortExact.Abelian` and `Algebra.Homology.ShortExact.Preadditive` are also removed because the content of these files has become redundant with the new homology API.

---

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

Pull request successfully merged into master.

  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7290609170/job/19867783810)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7290609170/job/19867783593)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7290609170/job/19867783365)

Very nice refactor, thanks!

bors merge

Very nice refactor, thanks!

bors merge

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion (ShortComplex.mk (ModuleCat.ofHom (πs C o)) (ModuleCat.ofHom (Linear_CC' C hsC ho)) ```

The old statements were slightly more general because `hR₁` and `hR₂` contain four exactness statements and both of the four lemmas only require three of them. How hard would it be to state your new versions with the generality of the old versions?

Thanks for the suggestion. I will try to implement that: it should be easy to relax the assumption on one of the two rows. However, for most applications, we would usually have the full assumptions, so that I will implement two versions of each lemma like `mono_of_epi_of_mono_of_mono`, one with the weaker assumptions, and one with the stronger assumptions.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - refactor: use the new homology API for the four and the five lemmas

source.title: feat/refactor: redefinition of homology + derived categories
